EnabledStatus.name: EnabledStatus
EnabledStatus.description: A simple status value for the object.

hwIgmpSnoopingRouterPortAge.name: hwIgmpSnoopingRouterPortAge
hwIgmpSnoopingRouterPortAge.description: Configure the aging time of the router port.

hwIgmpSnoopingResponseTime.name: hwIgmpSnoopingResponseTime
hwIgmpSnoopingResponseTime.description: Configure the maximum query response time.

hwIgmpSnoopingHostTime.name: hwIgmpSnoopingHostTime
hwIgmpSnoopingHostTime.description: Configure the aging time of the multicast group port.

hwIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitTable.name: hwIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitTable
hwIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitTable.description: The table lists the maximum group number that one interface could do IGMP Snooping.

hwIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitEntry.name: hwIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitEntry
hwIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) representing the maximum group number on an interface which IGMP Snooping operation is enabled.

hwIgmpSnoopingGroupIfIndex.name: hwIgmpSnoopingGroupIfIndex
hwIgmpSnoopingGroupIfIndex.description: The ifIndex value of the port on which IGMP snooping is enabled.

hwIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitNumber.name: hwIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitNumber
hwIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitNumber.description: The maxmum group number of IGMP Snooping on a port.

hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveTable.name: hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveTable
hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveTable.description: The table specifies the fast leave status on those ports that do IGMP Snooping.

hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveEntry.name: hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveEntry
hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveEntry.description: An entry specifies the fast leave status on those ports that do IGMP Snooping.

hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveIfIndex.name: hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveIfIndex
hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveIfIndex.description: The ifIndex value of the port on which IGMP snooping is enabled.

hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveStatus.name: hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveStatus
hwIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveStatus.description: The fast leave status of the port on which IGMP Snooping is enabled.

hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyTable.name: hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyTable
hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyTable.description: This is a table specifies the group policy parameter and Vlan ID of the IGMP Snooping port.

hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyEntry.name: hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyEntry
hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyEntry.description: An entry representing the group policy parameter and Vlan ID of a port on which IGMP Snooping operation is enabled.

hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyIfIndex.name: hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyIfIndex
hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyIfIndex.description: The ifIndex value of the port on which IGMP Snooping is enabled.

hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyVlanID.name: hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyVlanID
hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyVlanID.description: The Vlan ID which the IGMP Snooping port is attached to.

hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyParameter.name: hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyParameter
hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyParameter.description: The ACL Number which is used as the group policy parameter of the IGMP Snooping port.

hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyStatus.name: hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyStatus
hwIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyStatus.description: This object is used to create or delete a row and represent the current status of this row. Now support three state:CreateAndGo,Active,Destroy.

hwIgmpSnoopingNonFloodingStatus.name: hwIgmpSnoopingNonFloodingStatus
hwIgmpSnoopingNonFloodingStatus.description: Configure to disable multicast flooding when no member exists in the destinated group. To use this function,IGMP snooping must be enabled.

hwIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusTable.name: hwIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusTable
hwIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusTable.description: The table used to enable or disable IGMP snooping on the specified VLAN.

hwIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusEntry.name: hwIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusEntry
hwIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusEntry.description: An entry representing the IGMP snooping status on the specified VLAN.

hwIgmpSnoopingVlanID.name: hwIgmpSnoopingVlanID
hwIgmpSnoopingVlanID.description: An index uniquely identifies on which VLAN IGMP snooping is enabled or disabled.

hwIgmpSnoopingVlanEnabled.name: hwIgmpSnoopingVlanEnabled
hwIgmpSnoopingVlanEnabled.description: Indicating whether IGMP snooping is enabled on this VLAN.

hwRecvIGMPGQueryNum.name: hwRecvIGMPGQueryNum
hwRecvIGMPGQueryNum.description: The statistics of IGMP general query packets received on the device.

hwRecvIGMPSQueryNum.name: hwRecvIGMPSQueryNum
hwRecvIGMPSQueryNum.description: The statistics of IGMP specific query packets received on the device.

hwRecvIGMPV1ReportNum.name: hwRecvIGMPV1ReportNum
hwRecvIGMPV1ReportNum.description: The statistics of IGMP V1 report packets received on the device.

hwRecvIGMPV2ReportNum.name: hwRecvIGMPV2ReportNum
hwRecvIGMPV2ReportNum.description: The statistics of IGMP V2 report packets received on the device.

hwRecvIGMPLeaveNum.name: hwRecvIGMPLeaveNum
hwRecvIGMPLeaveNum.description: The statistics of IGMP leave packets received on the device.

hwRecvErrorIGMPPacketNum.name: hwRecvErrorIGMPPacketNum
hwRecvErrorIGMPPacketNum.description: The statistics of error IGMP packets received on the device.

hwSentIGMPSQueryNum.name: hwSentIGMPSQueryNum
hwSentIGMPSQueryNum.description: The statistics of IGMP specific query packets sent from the device.

hwIgmpSnoopingClearStats.name: hwIgmpSnoopingClearStats
hwIgmpSnoopingClearStats.description: The configuration to clear the statistics of IGMP packets.
